Parameter.Name: Style
Parameter.Description: Name of a style for the scalebbar
Parameter.Label: Style

Parameter.Name: MinWidth
Parameter.Description: Minimum width of the scalebar in pixels
Parameter.Label: Minimum width

Parameter.Name: MaxWidth
Parameter.Description: Maximum width of the scalebar in pixels
Parameter.Label: Maximum width

Parameter.Name: Divisions
Parameter.Description: The number of major divsions to use
Parameter.Label: Divisions

Parameter.Name: SubDivisions
Parameter.Description: The number of minor divisions within each major divsion
Parameter.Label: SubDivisions

Parameter.Name: ShowMinorMeasures
Parameter.Description: A flag to indicate if the minor divsions should be displayed
Parameter.Label: ShowMinorMeasures

Parameter.Name: AbbreviateLabel
Parameter.Description: A flag to indicate if the full or an abbreviated units name is displayed
Parameter.Label: Abbreviate label

Parameter.Name: SingleLine
Parameter.Description: A flag to indicate if the scalebar should bee drawn all on a single line
Parameter.Label: Single line
